name: The Keeper Demo
description:
You play as Arthur, the new keeper for the lighthouse on the Pale, an abandoned island off the coast of Maine. Unlock the mysteries of the island's dark past in this 90s inspired survival-horror!

The Keeper is an oldskool, atmosphere-first PSX style horror game straight outta the 90s. It's locked to 240p (please do not adjust your television sets) with a crisp 4:3 aspect ratio.

The demo is the first full act of the game, it's about an hour of playtime.  If you really want to, there is an optional donation of $4. The full release is planned for 2023.

You can support by simply playing the demo and leaving feedback on the discords (https://discord.gg/HnrjKjQ9) to help guide development, but if you want to throw a coffee my way, the patreon is below :)

https://www.patreon.com/vide01
